DataElement.preferredName: Other Concomitant Agent Discontinue Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free text reason for discontinuation of concomitant therapy for breast cancer that is different than the reasons previously specified or mentioned. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pharmaceutical agent other than agent(s) tested in a given protocol that is administered to or used by a subject either prior to or during the study. Supportive care and essential ancillary medications required by a treatment regimen should be clearly identified. A protocol complete instructions including appropriate indication, dosage, administration route, schedule, restrictions to use, and any other relevant data should be explicitly stated. Concept also refers to substance(s) used prior or during the study that are not specified by the protocol._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned. (NCI)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:A pharmaceutical agent other than agent(s) tested in a given protocol that is administered to or used by a subject either prior to or during the study. Supportive care and essential ancillary medications required by a treatment regimen should be clearly identified. A protocol complete instructions including appropriate indication, dosage, administration route, schedule, restrictions to use, and any other relevant data should be explicitly stated. Concept also refers to substance(s) used prior or during the study that are not specified by the protocol.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

A pharmaceutical agent other than agent(s) tested in a given protocol that is administered to or used by a subject either prior to or during the study. Supportive care and essential ancillary medications required by a treatment regimen should be clearly identified. A protocol's complete instructions including appropriate indication, dosage, administration route, schedule, restrictions to use, and any other relevant data should be explicitly stated. Concept also refers to substance(s) used prior or during the study that are not specified by the protocol.

Property.preferredDefinition: Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text used to describe the action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process that is different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support U Washington adoption of C3D for FES trial.
